name: PETARMOR Home Household Spray for Fleas and Ticks, Flea Treatment for Home, Prevents Flea and Tick Re-Infestations for Cats and Dogs, Treats Carpet, Furniture, and More, 24 Ounce
short_description: PetArmor Home Household Spray kills ticks, fleas, flea eggs, and flea larvae for up to 7 months
This flea and tick home spray also acts as a deodorizer for pet beds, carpet floors, area rugs, and couches
Flea and tick control effectively kills roaches, ants, spiders, lice, crickets, centipedes, waterbugs, silverfish, and sowbugs
Flea spray disrupts the flea life cycle by preventing the development of adult fleas
Covers 500 square feet of your home, protecting your family-and indoor/outdoor cats and dogs-from the biting, itching, and disease transmitted by fleas and ticks
product_description: Your pets are family, and PetArmor helps you confidently care for your pets, and your home-especially when it comes to flea and tick prevention. PetArmor Plus conveniently provides vet-quality protection without the expense of a vet visit. PetArmor Home Household spray kills fleas, flea eggs, flea larvae, and ticks hiding around your home. This flea & tick treatment for home covers 500 square feet and works for up to 7 months, effectively disrupting the flea life cycle. Armor your pet with America's #1 flea & tick brand. To apply, spray bottle in a sweeping motion over affected areas, then allow the spray to dry for a full 2 hours. There's no need to leave your home during this time, but it's best to avoid the sprayed area until it has dried. It's also not recommended for spraying directly on bedding. Safety tip: Always read the directions thoroughly when using any flea and tick product. Nielsen Total US xAOC+Pet Specialty, latest 52 weeks ending 12/30/2017. PetArmor includes PetArmor, PetArmor Plus, PetArmor FastCaps & PetArmor Advanced II.

Directions Directions for Use It is a violation of Federal law to use this product in a manner inconsistent with its labeling. READ ENTIRE LABEL BEFORE EACH USE. USE RESTRICTIONS - Apply this product only as specified on this label. Do not contaminate food or feedstuffs. This product is for indoor residential use only. Do not use in aircraft cabins. For use only when building has been vacated by human beings and pets. Do not apply this product in a way that will contact workers or other persons, either directly or through drift. Only protected handlers may be in the treated area during application. Do not remain in treated area. Exit area immediately and remain outside the treated area until aerosols, vapors, and/or mists have dispersed. Wait two hours after application, and then open windows, vents and doors for two hours. If an odor is still detected, additional ventilation is required. Do not use in food areas of food handling establishments, restaurants, or other areas where food is commercially prepared or processed. Do not use in serving areas while food is exposed or facility is in operation. Serving areas are areas where food is served, such as dining rooms, but excluding areas where foods may be prepared or held. Prior to space spray applications, cover or remove food, and cover food processing surfaces or clean after treatment and before use. Do not apply more than one time per day. Remove pets, birds, and cover fish aquariums before use. To Use This Product Correctly: One canister of fogger will treat a room up to 16 ft. x 16 ft. with an 8 ft. ceiling or 2,000 cubic ft. of unobstructed space. DO NOT use more than one fogger per room. DO NOT use in small, enclosed spaces such as closets, cabinets or under counters or tables. DO NOT use in a room 5 ft. X 5 ft. or smaller; instead, allow fog to enter from other rooms. Use of a fogger in an enclosed space may cause the product to explode, resulting in injury to people or damage to property. Before you Fog: Remove or cover exposed food and drinking water before application. Remove or cover dishes, utensils, food processing equipment and food preparation surfaces, or wash them before use. Remove pets and birds, cover and turn off fish aquariums before activating canister. Shut off all exhaust fans and close all windows, doors, and ventilators. Turn off ALL ignition sources such as pilot lights (shut off gas valves), other open flames or running electrical appliances that cycle off and on (i.e., refrigerators, thermostats, etc). Call your gas utility or management company if you need assistance with your pilot lights. Cover wood floors and wood furniture in the immediate area around fogger with newspapers or a drop cloth. Open cabinets, cupboards, drawers, closets, and doors in areas to be treated. Place a chair, small table, or stand in the center of the room to be treated, and cover with newspaper. For best results, treat all infested areas. Fill out and place hang-tag on the door to the treated area to alert family and others with access to the treated area not to enter for two hours. To Start Fogging: SHAKE WELL BEFORE USE. KEEP CONTAINER UPRIGHT. Immediately before activating canister, complete the door hang tag by filling in the time and date to instruct people not to enter the treated area (premises) for at least two hours following the time of activation. Hang the tag on the door to the entrance. Point the canister away from face and eyes when releasing (canister sprays straight up). To lock valve in open position for automatic discharge, press valve button down firmly, until it snaps into place. Once the canister has been activated, place the canister on the chair, small table, or stand (that is covered by newspaper) in the center of the room to be treated. DO NOT remain in treated area. Vacate the treated house, individual apartment unit or other structure immediately. Do not Re-enter for 2 hours. Airing Out: Wait two hours after application, then open windows, vents and doors for two hours. If an odor is still detectable, additional ventilation is required. For more effective control of storage pests, open all cupboard doors, and drawers for better penetration of fog. Remove all infested foodstuffs and dispose of in outdoor trash. For flea and tick control, thoroughly vacuum all carpeting, upholstered furniture, along baseboards, under furniture and in closets. Put vacuum bag into a sack and dispose of in outside trash. Mop all hard floor surfaces.
Age Range Description All Life Stages

name: Flea Trap 2 Packs – Premium Flea Traps for Inside Your Home – Natural and Child-Friendly Light Trap for Indoor with Natural Glue Discs Refills and LED Lightbulb
short_description: Optimal Solution for a Safe Home-- Our flea trap features a 360° design that attracts pests from all angles, providing an ideal solution for eliminating fleas in homes. The natural glue discs and light bulbs work together to attract and trap fleas. Experience a clean home and make your pet happy with our efficient flea trap.

Easy to Use & Clean-- Simply installing the light bulb after inserting a glue board, plug the trap in, and place where fleas are common. The natural glue discs are easily be kept clean and replaceable. Pls Replace the glue board every 2-3 weeks for best results.

Safe and Intimate Design-- Our flea lamps are made of high-quality materials that are harmless to humans and pets, and can attract fleas in homes, especially in areas where spraying is not possible. Very suitable for detecting fleas in areas where pets stay.

How it Works-- Our flea traps come with a built-in led that attracts bugs through light, heat, color, and smell. The bugs are then caught on the natural glue discs that you can replace as often as necessary.

Complete Pack-- The flea trap set also includes 4 x 7W lightbulbs, 2 led lightbulbs, and 6 flea trap refills that you can easily replace when they are full. The device is made of PP and metal for durability.

name: Vet’s Best Flea & Tick Home Spray for Cats – Plant-Based Flea and Tick Treatment with Cotton Spice Scent – Gentle Flea Mist for Indoor Use – Made in USA Natural Cat Flea Control – 32 oz
short_description: FLEA & TICK HOME SPRAY FOR CATS: Safe to use around cats and on pet bedding, carpets, flooring, rugs, and drapes. This effective spray helps control fleas and ticks in your home environment, keeping your feline and surroundings protected and comfortable.

PLANT POWERED INGREDIENTS: Our carefully crafted formula targets and kills fleas, ticks, mosquitoes, spiders, ants, and bed bugs. Made with plant-based ingredients, it offers effective pest control while being gentle and safe for your home and pets.

COTTON SPICE SCENT: Flea and tick home spray for cats now features a cozy cotton spice scent! Made with real cottonseed and clove oil, this natural fragrance leaves your home smelling fresh while helping keep pests away safely and effectively.

#1 NATURAL FLEA & TICK BRAND*: Protect pets and home with plant-powered pest control from the leading natural brand. Made in the USA with steam-distilled essential oils. Proven effective and family-safe. *Based on 2024 Nielsen data.

30 YEARS: For over 30 years, Vet’s Best has blended quality, plant-based ingredients to comfort, soothe, and protect your pets. Our trusted formulas provide natural care that supports your pet’s health and happiness every day with decades of expertise.
SAFE AND WORRY FREE – Safe for your cats and home when used as directed.
product_description: Vet’s Best Flea & Tick Home Spray for Cats is the ultimate solution for pet parents looking for a safe, effective, and natural alternative to chemical-laden flea and tick control products. Formulated with a unique blend of certified natural essential oils including cottonseed oil and clove oil, this gentle mist is specifically designed to target fleas, flea larvae, flea eggs, mosquitoes, spiders, ants, bed bugs, roaches, stable flies, and ticks on contact, making it a powerful ally in your fight against infestations. The cotton spice scent adds a refreshing, pleasant aroma that leaves your home smelling clean without overwhelming your sensitive feline. Made without the use of any harsh chemicals, this plant-based formula is safe to use around the entire family when used as directed and is ideal for treating not only cats but also cat bedding, carpets, furniture, and other areas where pests may reside. Made in the USA with quality ingredients, Vet’s Best is trusted by veterinarians and pet owners alike. Whether you're dealing with a seasonal flare-up or seeking year-round protection, this 32 oz spray bottle offers a convenient and non-messy application that integrates seamlessly into your pet care routine. Ideal for indoor cats and multi-cat households, this flea and tick spray helps ensure your feline stays comfortable, non-itchy, and protected—naturally. Choose Vet’s Best Flea & Tick Home Spray for Cats to defend your home with confidence and compassion.

Directions READ ENTIRE LABEL BEFORE EACH USE AND USE ONLY IN ACCORDANCE WITH LABEL INSTRUCTIONS. For severe infestations, first consult your veterinarian for treatment recommendations. If your pet is undergoing any medical treatment or has known sensitivities or allergies, please consult your veterinarian before using this product. For Cats 12 Weeks or Older: Shake well before use. Sensitivity may occur with the use of any product on individual cats. Spray a small amount on the cat, observing for any signs of sensitivity (skin irritation, rapid breathing, incoordination, etc.) for one hour. Thereafter, apply a light spray on the cat’s coat and brush in so product reaches the skin. Do not saturate or soak the coat. Use caution to avoid contact with eyes, nose, mouth, genitals, and other sensitive areas. Let coat dry completely before allowing cats to groom themselves to minimize incidental ingestion. Wash hands thoroughly after use. If fleas or ticks are present, apply two (2) times per week with at least 48 hours between applications. For ongoing prevention and maintenance apply one (1) time per week. For Pet Bedding, Pillows, Blankets, Carpet, & Rugs: Shake well before use. This product is designed to be non-staining, however, always apply a small amount to an inconspicuous area to test for colorfastness. Spray the surface uniformly with a light spray. Do not saturate or soak. Allow product to dry before allowing dogs to re-enter the area. Not recommended for use on fine furniture. Wash hands thoroughly after use. Apply one (1) to two (2) times per week with at least 48 hours between applications. To help reduce the occurrence of fleas and ticks, this product is best used year-round when combined with other Vet's Best® products for pets, home and yard.
Model Name Vet's Best Flea and Tick Cat & Home Spray – Cotton Spice Scent – 32oz

product_description: How the Flea Trap Light Works Effectively? The principle of flea traps is to use light, heat, color, sweat odor and the phototaxis and thermotaxis of pests to lure flea and other pests from 50 feet away. Once they enter the flea trap, they will be firmly stuck with the glue board and cannot escape. Trapped fleas help break the breeding cycle and alert you to potential infections. Also helps detect if flea infestation arose especially in areas you can’t spray. The indoor flea trap is perfect for home use, such as bedrooms, living rooms, kitchens, dining rooms and pet house. Warming Tips: 1. Prohibited to use outdoors or in humid environments! 2. Don't cover the flea trap when working. 3. To replace the bulb or sticker, please turn off the power first. 4. Flea traps are great for continued use. If the plastic refill is 3 weeks old or has 70% coverage of pests, you can replace it with a new sticker.

name: Flea and Tick Spray for Dogs & Home– Natural Flea and Tick Prevention for Dogs– Bed Bug Spray & Multi-Insect Killer– Scentless Plant-Based Formula Kills on Contact (32 oz)
short_description: Breaks the reproduction cycle with continuous pet use: Used directly on pets as part of an ongoing flea prevention routine, this flea and tick spray is capable of killing adult fleas and ticks while targeting eggs, larvae, and nymphs to help stop reinfestation when used consistently. Infestations can take 2 weeks or longer to break completely.

Spray on fur and spread evenly over the coat: Used on dogs by spraying directly onto the fur, then brushing or rubbing in by hand to distribute evenly across the coat, helping ensure full-body coverage where fleas live, bite, and reproduce. Kills bugs, eggs, and larvae on contact, and maintains protection when used at least once per day.

Used on pet bedding, blankets, & frequented areas: Used in the home on pet bedding, blankets, crates, carpets, and resting areas where pets spend time and where fleas and their eggs may hide, helping reduce environmental sources of reinfestation.

Scent-Free and Non-Staining Flea Spray for Dogs: Plant-based formula for routine pet & home use. Used by pet owners seeking a naturally derived solution, this plant-powered spray is designed for regular use on pets and in household locations without relying on harsh chemical treatments. Formulations includes No Essential Oils, which can prove toxic to dogs.

USA-Made Natural Pest Protection- Lab tested and developed formula using eco-friendly, plant-powered ingredients. Trusted natural flea spray for dogs for families who want safe and effective pest control. Doubles as a bed bug killer and controls ants, spiders, roaches, mites, and other household bugs. Note: You may receive either our previous or updated packaging; contents are identical.

name: 2 Packs Flea Traps for Inside Your Home with 6 Sticky Pads, Fleas Light Traps Kills Fleas in House, Hanging Flea Lamp with USB Cable Pest Control for Bugs Moths Gnats Indoor and Outdoor
short_description: 2024 ENHANCED FLEA TRAP - We know how awful flea attacks can be, so come and try the amazing 2024 Enhanced Flea Traps! Based on the characteristics of fleas and other pests, it uses color, heat and light waves to lure the bad guys into the glue trap and keep them from escaping! Besides, the fantastic thing about this termination station for fleas is that it doesn't use any chemical pesticides, which makes it perfect for families with children and pets! 24/7 protection for you and your family

KEEP THOSE PESTS RIGHT WHERE THEY BELONG! - This incredible flea light trap for indoor has two light sources—warm light and UV light—making it the perfect match for dealing with fleas and other pests. When it's time to take on moths, fleas, and mites, simply turn on level 1-2 (warm light). For mosquitoes, flies, and bugs, turn on levels 3-4 (UV light). Each light source has a strong and weak mode, allowing you to alternate between day and night with ease and raising the seasonal protection

SMALL DETAILS MAKE A BIG DIFFERENCE - The flea trap has been redesigned with a new hanging design and USB power cord! This not only allows the flea trap to better lure flying pests, but also means it can be used in a variety of scenarios both indoors and outdoors. Electric flea trap has a maximum lure window of only 2.5 inches and pet's furry tail or paw can't get stuck. Plus, we also use LED light . No more worrying about short-circuiting bulbs or spending a fortune on family bills

SAYING GOODBYE IS A STEP-BY-STEP PROCESS - First, open the flea catcher and remove the sticky pads. Then, remove the cover film from the sticky pad and place it in the trap. Finally, press the button to select the appropriate light source and intensity mode according to the type of pests to be attracted. Place it in a pet house, carpet, under mattresses, floor cracks, bedrooms, living rooms, kitchen, yard or other area. In most cases, the effects of the trap should be visible after 2-4 weeks

What's inside the package? - Our product is thoughtfully prepared for you: 2 flea traps for inside your home with light(Individual size: 6.7 inches in diameter and 2 inches high), 6 sticky pad replacements(Individual area: 22 square inches), 2 usb power cables (40 inches), 2 usb wall chargers, 1 instruction manual. Suggestion: if the sticker has been used for 2 weeks or the sticky pad is covered with 70% pests, it can be replaced with new sticky pad, which will achieve the best luring effect
